description: Categorize bank and card transactions automatically to streamline expense tracking. Reveal spending patterns and merchants with clear categories and summaries. Accelerate budgeting, reconciliation, and reporting with accurate, structured data.

capabilities.name: categorize-transactions-by-dazoom
capabilities.description: [씨즈데이터] DaZoom 통장 및 카드 거래내역 분석 툴
